title: Warhol Lecture Series: Donna De Salvo
hero_caption: Andy Warhol. Big Electric Chair, 1967-1968. Gift of Edlis|Neeson Collection. © 2019 The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc. / Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York.
short_description: Noted Warhol expert Donna De Salvo, organizing curator of Andy Warhol—From A to B and Back Again, provides insight into the artist’s prolific career. Presented in association with the exhibition Andy Warhol—From A to B and Back Again, this lecture series will highlight various aspects of Warhol’s production across the entirety of his career.
list_description: Presented by the Society for Contemporary Art
description:
Noted Warhol expert Donna De Salvo, organizing curator of Andy Warhol—From A to B and Back Again, provides insight into the artist’s prolific career.

Presented in association with the exhibition Andy Warhol—From A to B and Back Again, this lecture series will highlight various aspects of Warhol’s production across the entirety of his career.

Presented by the Society for Contemporary Art
